author: Teresa Roca
title: Betrayed! Pregnant Kailyn Lowry Blindsided By Ex-Husband Javi Marroquin’s New Romance
text:
Yes, please sign me up to receive The Daily Juice Privacy Policy send Betrayed! Pregnant Kailyn Lowry Blindsided By Ex-Husband Javi Marroquin’s New Romance Should the 'Teen Mom' be concerned about Madison Channing Walls' dark past? Posted on Mar 22, 2017 @ 12:03PM 
Javi Marroquin has moved on from Kailyn Lowry with a blonde bombshell – and his ex-wife had no idea! A source close to Lowry exclusively told RadarOnline.com that the Teen Mom 2 star is blindsided by his romance with Madison Channing Walls . 
“Kail doesn’t know anything about a new girlfriend,” the insider exclusively told Radar. 
PHOTOS: 13 Reasons Kailyn Lowry & Javi Marroquin Ended Their Rocky Marriage 
“She said it’s because I harassed her via text about all this divorce and guy stuff,” Marroquin told Radar at the time of the filing. “I signed a consent PFA, which means there’s no evidence of abuse. I just can’t contact her unless it’s in regards to Lincoln for a year.” 
But should Lowry, 25, contact Marroquin about his new relationship? 
PHOTOS: Javi’s New Girl? Marroquin Reveals The Truth Behind Kissing Another Woman On Vacation 
According to court documents obtained from Williamson County Clerk of Court, Channing Walls was busted for “acquiring or otherwise exercising control over property, assorted cosmetics, of the value of $50 or more but less than $500, from the stock and inventory of CVS pharmacy.” 
She pled guilty and was ordered to pay $220 in fines and court costs. 
But the arrest isn’t Lowry’s only worry, as Channing Walls revealed while on The Real World that she is a recovering heroin addict . 
PHOTOS: He Has a Type! Javi Marroquin Caught On Camera Flirting With Kailyn Lowry Lookalike 
“I am scarred for life from it,” Channing Walls, 26, said. “I just feel grateful to be alive. 
She told the Chicago Sun Times in a 2014 interview that she’s been sober for two years. 
“I did a lot of things that I’m not proud of,” she said. “But it’s okay because it made me who I am and it made me a better person overcoming all of that. It was a big self-reflection for me.”
